name: manage-my-damn-life
description: Manage My Damn Life is a self-hosted planner and productivity web app built with Next.js. It includes tasks, notes, journal entries, and GTD-style boards, designed to replace fragmented life management tools.

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Create, organize, and track tasks with due dates, priorities, and completion status

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Maintain a personal journal with daily entries, tags, and search functionality

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: Visualize tasks and events in daily, weekly, or monthly calendar layouts

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize content across tasks, notes, and journal entries with flexible tagging

features.title: Search Functionality
features.description: Find any item quickly using full-text search across all content types

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access and manage your life from any device with a responsive interface
